meanings.definition: Very thick or dense in consistency or amount.
meanings.sent1: The mud was superthick and hard to walk through.
meanings.sent2: The fog was superthick, making it difficult to see ahead.
meanings.sent3: I tried to spread the superthick peanut butter on my sandwich, but it got stuck to the knife!
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room was superthick, you could cut it with a knife.
meanings.sent5: The superthick blanket kept me warm all night.

meanings.definition: Having a great extent or depth.
meanings.sent1: The book had a superthick plot with many twists and turns.
meanings.sent2: The forest was superthick with trees, creating a dense canopy.
meanings.sent3: The mystery was so superthick that even the detective was stumped!
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were superthick, like a storm brewing inside her.
meanings.sent5: The silence in the room was superthick, almost tangible.
